content: We have 4 errors in US Core which are terminology related and cannot be resolved in a timely manner prior to publication. We have carefully documented in the publication log. These errors cannot be suppressed in the qa output. Do they need to be suppressed?
cc @Brett Marquard and @Gay Dolin
So will those errors also be present in any IGs that conform to US Core? Or does your workaround from the other thread fix those errors?
I suspect it will fix it since we are reverting to US Core 3.1.1 way (current published version). Did that work for you?
is already committed to CI build too
